description.value:
A spathinae colony has compression and gains a +4 racial bonus to KAC against bull rush, grapple, reposition, and trip combat maneuvers. In addition, the colony can always take 10 on the escape and tumble tasks of the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.3QdtsfnVJsHEdrt0]{Acrobatics} skill and gains a +4 racial bonus to Acrobatics checks for those tasks.

Toggle on/off KAC bonus against bull rush, grapple, reposition, and trip combat maneuvers in Modifiers tab.

modifiers.name: Swarm Flexibility - KAC against combat maneuvers
modifiers.notes: A spathinae colony has compression and gains a +4 racial bonus to KAC against bull rush, grapple, reposition, and trip combat maneuvers.
